content.title: Side to Side Box Shuffle Instructions

items: Start in a standing position with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step to the right with your right foot, crossing it in front of your left foot.
Step to the left with your left foot, crossing it in front of your right foot.
Step to the right with your right foot, returning to your starting position.
Step to the left with your left foot, returning to your starting position.
Repeat steps 2-5 for the desired number of repetitions or time.

content.title: Side to Side Box Shuffle Form & Visual
Side to Side Box Shuffle Benefits

items: Improves agility and coordination
Increases cardiovascular endurance
Targets the lower body muscles, including the quads, hamstrings, and glutes
Can be modified to include upper body movements, such as punching or reaching
Can be done with or without equipment, making it a versatile exercise option

content.title: Side to Side Box Shuffle Muscles Worked

items: Quadriceps
Hamstrings
Glutes
Calves
Abdominals
Obliques
